Quick introduction¶

This is a quick introduction to MathML.js.

Setup¶

To add MathML.js to your web page just add in the head of the document the lines bellow:

<script type='text/javascript' src="jquery-2.0.3.min.js"></script>
<script type='text/javascript' src="mathml.js"></script>

Note

If you like you can use jQuery from CDNs you can. But you MUST download and save MathML.js in the same folder of your web page.

Use¶

For interact with the equations just use the pointing device to select one element to interact and click it.
